name: DEATH BOX
description:
Death Box is a brutal fast-paced action platformer where both you and your enemies die in one hit.

If you wish to defeat the forces of evil that have invaded the lands, you must survive 15 levels of blood pumping 1-3 minutes of incoming waves of demons!

Features
• 15 brutally difficult levels where you have to survive oncoming waves of enemies
• 10 different types of demons
• 3 different game modes: Normal Mode, Endless Mode and Super Death Box Mode
